column3: This is really something you should add to your local global `.gitignore`.
> This is really something you should add to your local global `.gitignore`.\n\nagree

> This is really something you should add to your local global .gitignore.\n\nThanks for your contribution but I tend to agree. We can't add the scribble files for every possible IDE to our gitignore. that's not something we'd want to maintain.
